page.title: 02A LOCHFOOT CHILD'S LIFESTYLE
page.content: AT SEVEN O'CLOCK I GET UP AND DRESS IN MY CORD JEANS,SHIRT AND JERSEY,WASH AND GO DOWNSTAIRS FOR BREAKFAST.I HAVE A BOWL OF KELLOG'S FROSTIES AND A MUG OF HOT ORANGE JUICE.WHEN I HAVE FINISHED I GO OUTSIDE TO PLAY UNTIL MUM IS READY TO DRIVE MARK,LESLEY AND ME TO SCHOOL.AT SCHOOL WE HAVE THREE INTERVALS,TWO OF TWENTY MINUTES AND AN HOUR AT LUNCH-TIME.MY FAVOURITE SUBJECTS ARE READING,GYMN AND MATHS. AFTER SCHOOL I CHANGE INTO MY PLAY CLOTHES AND HELP DAD ON THE FARM.FOR TEA I USUALLY HAVE SOMETHING LIKE STEAK AND POTATO OR FISH AND CHIPS.I GO OUT TO PLAY OR STAY IN AND WATCH TELEVISION.ABOUT 08.30 I GO UPSTAIRS AND BRUSH MY TEETH,CHANGE INTO MY PYJAMAS,SAY MY PRAYERS AND GET INTO BED.
